title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The point is earned for a correct expression that substitutes both correct values from the table, with or without simplification.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include a correct average rate of change.
The student response accurately includes a correct average rate of change.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The second point is earned for a correct expression that substitutes both correct values from the table, with or without simplification.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
The first point is earned for demonstration of a correct derivative for G MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGhbaaaa@33FE@ and does not require a separate statement of G ′  ( t ). The derivative and evaluation of the derivative can be expressed in one line to earn both points.
